# AVAsyncProperty.Status.loading

**Case**

The system is loading the property.

## Declaration

```swift
case loading
```

## Status values

- **AVAsyncProperty.Status.notYetLoaded**: The system hasn’t loaded a property value.
- **AVAsyncProperty.Status.loaded(_:)**: A property value is ready to use.
- **AVAsyncProperty.Status.failed(_:)**: A property value fails to load.
